appearance.title: Appearance & Theme
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application.
appearance.note: Theme changes are applied live and saved locally in your browser.

streamingPrefs.title: Streaming Preferences
streamingPrefs.qualityDescription: This preference would guide the server if multiple stream qualities were available.
streamingPrefs.performanceNote: Actual quality depends on source availability.

downloadLocation.title: Download Location (Conceptual)
downloadLocation.description: Manage where your downloads would be saved in a desktop app.
downloadLocation.note: In a desktop app, this would allow choosing a folder. This setting is conceptual for the web UI.
downloadLocation.toastDescriptionDesktop: In a desktop app, a folder picker would open. Location conceptually updated.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Manage application data stored in your browser.
dataManagement.playbackHistoryDescription: Clear your locally stored playback history (conceptual).
dataManagement.alertDescription: Are you sure you want to clear your playback history? This action cannot be undone (conceptual).
dataManagement.storageNote: Settings are stored in your browser's local storage.

settingsPage.toastHistoryClearedDesc: Your playback history has been conceptually cleared.

aboutPage.mainSubtitle: Your Ultimate Companion for Discovering Movies, TV Series, and YouTube Videos. (Streaming & Download features are UI templates for future implementation)

missionStory.title: Our Mission & Story
missionStory.p1: ChillyMovies aims to be a seamless, enjoyable experience for discovering and organizing your favorite content. We aim to provide a premium, user-friendly platform that respects your preferences.
missionStory.p2: This version serves as a UI template for a feature-rich media application.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features (UI Template)
featuresList: Extensive Library Discovery: UI for browsing movies and TV series from a vast catalog.
Advanced Search & Filtering: UI for finding content with filters by genre, year, and origin.
Flexible Viewing Options (UI): Interface elements for future streaming and download functionalities.
YouTube Tools (UI): Interface for future YouTube video processing.
Detailed Information: UI for displaying comprehensive details, trailers, and recommendations.
Responsive Design: A seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices.

steps.title: Explore
steps.content: Browse popular movies and TV series on the Home page, or use the Discover sections.

steps.title: Search
steps.content: Use the live search bar in the sidebar to find specific titles.

steps.title: Interact (UI Stubs)
steps.content: Click on 'Play' or 'Download' buttons to see placeholder actions. Full functionality to be implemented.

steps.title: Customize
steps.content: Personalize your theme in the Settings page.

versionNext.title: UI Template Version
versionNext.roadmapP1: This template can be extended with features like:
roadmapItems: Full streaming and download backend integration.
versionNext.stayTuned: This UI is ready for backend integration!

techAttributions.title: Technology & Attributions
techAttributions.intro: ChillyMovies UI is built using modern web technologies. Data is sourced from:

techList.value: The Movie Database for movie and TV series metadata.

techAttributions.outro: This UI template is for demonstration purposes. When implementing features, please respect copyright laws.
